name: tab-length

0.1.0.name: tab-length
0.1.0.description: Switch tab length with a shortcut.

readme:
# Tab Length

 - `Cmd-Ctrl-2` overrides tab length in the current editor to 2
 - `Cmd-Ctrl-4` overrides tab length to 4
 - `Cmd-Ctrl-0` resets tab length to file default

metadata.name: tab-length
metadata.description: Switch tab length with a shortcut.
